pkgmetadata.longdescription: uranium=======.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/toumorokoshi/uranium.svg?branch=master :alt: build status :target: https://travis-ci.org/toumorokoshi/uraniumUranium: an assembly tool for python, in python.uranium is an assembly tool that facilitates reuse and allowsfor execution of arbitrary setup code for Python services. Examplesinclude:* downloading and installing eggs in a sandbox (using virtualenv internally)* downloading remote configuration* providing a framework for assembly configuration (e.g. differences between dev and test mode)* any other arbitrary tasksYou can find out more here:http://uranium.readthedocs.org/en/latest/Getting started---------------http://uranium.readthedocs.org/en/latest/tutorial.html
